metadata.name: Haruki's Dawn
metadata.description:
*IMPORTANT* - Please check Youtube for high quality, 50mb is extremely small for a video with music and ambient sounds – https://youtu.be/LaT5y0hJDco
--------------

Haruki’s Dawn is a beginning of a small story about the young samurai named Haruki as he navigates through his training and prepares for a heroic quest.
